entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.17.2
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 7c6bdc1019dbfa1c59667dd6ba0cacf30774b41b Set release date
  • c0732a27089fdacafb5b65172e330b329f222849 Update changelog and disable clippy in CI for a bit
  • d52a071c053443efbbfc46782dae8eafd1f77236 Implement Default for LanguageOptions (#2145) [ #2137 ]
  • a4a85fe202156eaaca9a65a5715e443c63c8c2a2 Fix cachebusting not working with binary files [ #2142 ]

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.0
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 6f585856b4af248846650979895eca948fbd308f Ready for release
  • 4b0d13c0c702d62d9b70e660d6a49f82340f8163 Disable problematic test on Windows for now
  • 0bb37c43f66e9617ec7383d51c177dff9d968e4e Try to update images on azure pipelines
  • c054ed1b10163085f82805ba630d54ffbc3b8d03 Added support for multiple feeds (i.e. generating both Atom and RSS) (#2477)
  • 7f59792d501b0b46f27d50c6ce481de471248e5a Add unit tests to create a verify base url permutations. (#2484)
  • f60bda42f06ff97d04976adf0fd068fe788bda86 Update deps
  • ff9622f13224a7ecb5dfafbf6deb29fb087fcb80 Add support for yaml datetimes (#2208)
  • 9c1b004b13380723aa23ab4929614820ce673e3f Fix tests
  • cb2a4b0ee8b82c5efa9675c31e65cfc63766da92 Prevent generating folder & index.html for a specific page
  • c5991fc814a8151cbc8136ed0a70ea25350e20d7 fix ignore links to #top when checking anchors (#2519)
See More * 26f6677bfb6411f500be29d135bb2995a9335f86 Add support for Fuse.js search format (#2507) * 0d0036e14a28b5224dea6b71b17c69077f636c06 Update changelog * 2980d16da3fa3cf170cb53e4153c0b9ec0bb0ce5 feat: fix hot loading for config.toml changes on Linux (#2498) * 7294c76f6be5b3997c29a08c0aa8a4c8d3afce6a More more things to fs_utils file * 5b3a57b1ac19236629e76adf677c20762cfc8aba feat: move from notify v4 to notify-debouncer-full (#2503) * f4808679128c1e3ca4a97e6652655b817fa81241 cargo fmt * f4959bfd7e81d765cd80d4bcca30e93a0b6458c1 update tests * 2243e601c337fc4586d45f0223a52ba96e3b2d84 Update msrv * a3b0447f40e64a98ba828437a570a501f64a2378 Update changelog * 81db65def863ade4dd4864cb77ee33e06bf98aab Update deps * 6a2b890545398bb21cab57a3ba2ad8058bc229f2 Implemented bottom footnotes with backreferences (#2480) [ #1285 ] * 28a9da46efb2225c368931e75c2dc844fd9f5096 Restore trailing slash behaviour in serve command (#2482) * 96a9dc1a28e8bf921305b97ad5854434c78f0bce Refactor: remove even more unnecessary create_directory (#2428) * 9413d943f193f6722f27a422ea46bc9bac030453 Fix link check report inconsistency (#2472) * 6a25b62d43dfcf3f0d0f76638cdbce6cc511452a Fix resizing for images with EXIF orientation (#2468) * 954f1ce533c61a64472fde5c63a904c95d48c511 Fix section transparency serialization (#2462) * c072b32c7c1ada1f7fe5bcd2c2744da6bd7273b8 Fix --base-url improper path and protocol handling using `zola serve` (#2311) * aa8198658055638a59aee6b15b787a80ef6d59c6 Add MIME type to get_image_metadata (#2409) * 13682e1342e2c0135d7a99ffb4c065f677665afb Update pulldown_cmark dep to v0.10, and add pulldown_cmark_escape dep. (#2432) * 80bcc51fd227a659ef2f5141f92c72e362eb08b9 Issue 2359 get section by lang (#2410) * 7d18ddfde20d1190409ffebb2560a1d715e7b240 Allow ignoring files when link checking (#2264) * bdb18657b64d88e33912337a2b1a0f9c927142f9 Refactor: copy_assets instead of copy_asset (#2418) * 7fb0a70477e9cccf44deb0d8fe023c362a2a5176 Refactor: create_directory responsibly (#2407) * 9890df7d646864716dd3bd8dec0b6f5441dff6eb Allow IPv6 serve, default `base_url` to listen interface instead of 127.0.0.1 (#2395) * 13a4d9d9cfd9b0dd17516357002843044eafc5de fix(serve): content can be served from output_path (#2398) * a01e36bd86a7c3773397d27ef7c4d572c0abd9df Match `` in addition to `` (#2397) * a9ab3592c82b36906589b758b8d6f7beb6d8cbef Add option to include date in search index (#2401) * 8bdec67f0a7017cf2c000578932372b8b7f607c3 Next version * b965c89d12689d658a70f67f78d9de76b1a1cf48 Added documentation about relative image resizing and scaling of high-res (#2096) * 692c690a229ebd255dcc325f98d5bf40f2868d49 Update themes gallery (#2524) * 68a7002b43791d1ec4ecba0e00e30383cee14f3a Docs: Fix long words breaking the site on small screens (#2521) * c7f601f03ecdfad7956a76a802395cb79c024254 Update themes gallery (#2518) * 606c2be4255f2e78ac9205970fde186d1320070b Improve docs header style (#2516) * 0056851e3118c0f5be07b4b318016f0d68f7ab61 Fix theme images loading (#2517) * 8aedec9843e39c513cb4002d556bcb9ffdfcf850 Update themes gallery (#2510) * 3d0749d4782a2a9ebb2da537a056bb75839ce59a fix: fix docs CI workflow; build in MRs; build and deploy on master (#2504) * ceced4bf1c021a76e1f9061066a08cd660a10d41 Update themes gallery (#2505) * b0eacbc55cb5e699875c0e998532d2b69b99553a Spiff up the readme a bit. (#2501) * bf77b5223a45e8ea4fd527204cdd9f6c8e4215f2 Fix cloudflare pages asdf workaround (#2500) * 18245b323c041220851047f95eee2396b942abc9 Update themes gallery (#2490) * f682baa85ec4356ddabe1037a9c01d894d571025 docs(installation): Add information for Gentoo Linux (#2492) * b93640851eab8db6cc0f47419e050df2c762f3c4 Update overview.md (#2486) * 55e1844c1d6ba3d8a513b4184000e53d9e2f23d9 Docs: slugify.paths replaces whitespace with - not _ (#2474) * 0ec6a6c9734e9b3435a05b976b68877dcfca538d remove entries for sites that are no longer functional (#2470) * 9fefe84e695416ae1688ebfc6674d3d4b133bfa6 Update themes gallery (#2471) * 8c5df185f6da05c01364b1ee2ad96370ef6e86c4 Add www.joshuagawley.com to EXAMPLES.md (#2460) * 8af3e124a57c315b38f3bf61743c58ec3fffc5bb Point out that Sass compilation has to be enabled in config.toml (#2458) * 9a5e95cf3de3202dd106d29f301736801dd14bd4 fix CloudFront invalidation directive in publish.yml GitHub action file (#2456) * 4898d10b23039ba007104694ea2ad881c8a7f0ee docs: add failsafe.monster (#2455) * 11d2521d7a044501a3bbbb469137b7d4f771b0b8 Add mention of `authors` page variable to docs (#2451) * 18d28b70962ba2f90affaa8d1aa82afd981becee Fix typo in Fedora installation instructions (#2440) * cec01e6f48738bac78a5ecc812333aa7db1d861e Update themes gallery (#2425) * 4a56c068e034463f91ab49ce3b52cbcaf6d3059b Update themes gallery (#2406) * b89837a2cb9cce5f0f108bced8307468b3705767 Update installation.md to add winget command (#2413) * 9fe455892e850da0684817ae9553e61757d9e5e4 Add Zeabur deployment guide (#2408) * 52b29df01d90df13f1dd64e0cfd7c0d9bf14a01c Metainfo: Add 0.18.0 (#2402) * b3c95290897ce9bd442bf3a7f622d08668eb1430 Add more information about Vercel deployments (#2399) * 38199c125501e9ff0e700e96adaca72cc3f25d2b Update the GitLab Pages documentation (#2384) * 623756e7e34e96536f3a51f6815a9343b598ded7 fix: set the debian version used to build the Docker image (#2386) * 974a05d7be55afe23691ed610c43bd2f731f709c Update snapcraft version This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/getzola/zola/_build/results?buildId=3384&view=logs).

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.1
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 041da029eedbca30c195bc9cd8c1acf89b4f60c0 Disable all serve tests for Windows for now
  • b97f8a1fe2bd3631e6e322d24c2b75c46aebb536 Update changelog + add back config.generate_feed in templates for now
  • 9774d761e393537efcaf4349866a8ff4967c5d61 fix: treat any data change as a modification (#2542)
  • 233e1cdcbd0dca22e6dde094a1bedd6209b82643 Closes #2537

  • 1142370fdde56337e63ad6a70e2cf99855ea4081 Update themes gallery (#2544)
  • 2e17c776605621cea7673e442577d520113efca7 Better documentation for get_url [ #2530 ]
See More * 98843438c2f644c6cb9c3a00935abffb4c423bf8 Update images for release as well This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/getzola/zola/_build/results?buildId=3416&view=logs).

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.2
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 1aa21e0d95a2a7a2ed98bdc9d06f96db82ac66b2 Get ready for release
  • 59d70749af4bdd0c1d590b983f52d1b121dc1055 Fix shortcode/continue-reading parsing with inline HTML (smaller version) (#2606)
  • 286b88e268bd314756badfb57f885a55d697db96 fix: zola panic if no static dir (#2608)
  • abc851049d750ac41aa695a9575095f6cc0514fa Add config option to ignore code blocks for word count (#2599)
  • 9dad6596651df282e70206082ea97b3f48ab89f1 chore(components/config): cleanup code (#2592)
  • 9594fa8d061fe30f2ce0f827627b162dbde3a09d fix(taxonomies): fix error messages (#2591)
  • 64c868c3d4db9911faddc65a623ce9b0ca0a72c5 fix: handle another fs event to fix change monitoring on Windows 10 (#2575)
  • b3fc3f49cf3dd0c6a2ca5be8ef2fa749a13a82b6 Add fields to disable sitemap.xml and robots.txt generation (#2579) [ #2248 ]
